tirando o grande numero de cheat, é excelente

CSGO is like gambling you get addicted to opening cases that have the lowest chances and then you get the roulette spin 50/50 hacker or no hacker but house always wins so 80% of your games will be full of waller's, aimbotter's, lag scripts and crash scripts but that's ok CSGO is built on this and we love getting domed in the head cause you think of your real life situation and just want to get AWP'd in the face I rate this 10/10 love this game.
Un buen juego a pesar de los años su esencia nunca cambia. :D

ranking is trash also get put in games with much higher ranks and bullet dmg seems to be completly random you can hit someone in the head and it will one shot kill them or it will only do 4 dmg shot guns are the same way ive barrel stuffed someone and only did 13 dmg game is all around horrible now, game is also full of hackers anti cheat is horrible on it
